## Shapefiles For 1500m
```{r}
# Loading
bird_1500_shape <- st_read("Data/birds/shapefile/bird1500.shp")
pool_1500_shape <- st_read("Data/pools/shapefile/pool1500.shp")
sentinel_1500_shape <- st_read("Data/sentinels/shapefile/sentinel1500.shp")

# Plotting

plot(bird_1500_shape, main = "birds")
plot(pool_1500_shape, main = "pools")
plot(sentinel_1500_shape, main = "sentinels")
```
